home.text: Welcome, I'm Anouar Alahiane, UX/UI Designer and Front-end Developer Based in Marrakech

paragraphs: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm Mohamed Anouar Alahiane, a skilled web developer and UI/UX designer with over six years of experience. I specialize in using cutting-edge JavaScript frameworks such as React, Next.js, Remix, Vue.js, Astro.js, and more.

My passion for technology and design began years ago, and I have since dedicated myself to honing my craft through both formal education and hands-on experience. I have had the privilege of working on a wide range of projects, from small-scale startups to large-scale enterprise applications, always striving to deliver high-quality results.

My expertise in web development is focused on building dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks. I have extensive experience with React, Next.js, and Remix, and I am always eager to explore new tools and technologies to stay ahead of the curve.

In addition to my technical skills, I have a strong background in UI/UX design, with a focus on creating visually appealing and engaging user interfaces. I am adept at using design tools such as Figma and Sketch to create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs that exceed clients' expectations.

I am also well-versed in digital marketing, including SEO, social media marketing, and email marketing. This knowledge allows me to take a holistic approach to my projects, ensuring that all aspects of a client's digital presence are optimized for success.

Throughout my career, I have built a reputation for being a collaborative and communicative team player, always willing to go the extra mile to ensure client satisfaction. My strong adaptability and problem-solving skills enable me to navigate challenging situations with ease, delivering innovative and effective solutions.
Thank you for taking the time to review my portfolio. I am excited to hear more about your project and how I can help bring your digital vision to life.

projects.name: Monello
projects.description: Monello restaurant website, created with Nextjs, ChakraUI for styling, Gsap for animation and Sanity.io as a CMS.

projects.name: PIP
projects.description: Pritt Investment Partners website, created with Nextjs, Chakra UI for styling and Framer-motion for animations.

projects.name: BloodRiverInk
projects.description: A Tattoo shop’s website, showcasing their artist masterpieces. The website is created with Nextjs, Styled Components for styling, and framer motion for animation.

projects.name: FloowerStore
projects.description: A flower shop’s website, created with HydrogenJs framework, TailwindCss for the styling, StoreFront API along with Shopify’s backend as a CMS and E-com functionnalities.

projects.name: Mascot inc
projects.description: A Web solutions agency's website, using the new nextJs 13 with RFC, tailwindCss for the styling and gsap for animation.
